name: 計量經濟學
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BAU0040  統計學（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: 討論隨機變數的測量原理和應用，瞭解資料的機率分佈
討論計量經濟的理論基礎和應用，運用實證研究及解讀實證結果
R統計軟體運用在實際的資料上
syllabus:
1.  Statistics and Econometric Methods; R Lab, Open data download and management
2.  Probability & Statistics: Random Variable and Expectation; R Lab
3.  Cross-section Regression (1): Estimation and Inference
4.  Cross-section Regression (2): Residual Diagnosis and Prediction; R Lab
5.  Stationary univariate time series: ARMA Estimation and prediction
6.  Stationary Multivariate time series: Vector AR
7.  Nonstationary time series: ARiMA and unit root
8.  Nonstationary Multivariate time series: Vector ECM; R Lab
9.  Mid-term examination
10.  Topic 1: Risk analytics-- GARCH Volatility; R Lab
11.  Con’t
12.  Con’t
13.  Topic 2: Risk analytics-- tail risk of VaR and CVaR
14.  Con’t
15.  Topic 3: Risk and returns-- Portfolio optimization; R Lab
16.  Con’t
17.  Topic 4: Introduction to panel data
18.  Final examination

methodologies.note: R 軟體運用在實際資料的分析上

grading.note: 具備問題解決與決策制定的能力
具備問題解決與決策制定的能力

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【BAU0040  Statistics (I)】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
